Software

DynIMM

A coupled LAMMPS-OpenFOAM code to run dynamic Internal flow Multiscale Method (IMM) simulations.

DynIMM

A coupled LAMMPS-OpenFOAM code to run dynamic Internal flow Multiscale Method (IMM) simulations.
